name: BatteryElectrodeCurrentCollectorMetadata
description: A description of lithium ion battery current collector metadata

properties.name: planar_area
properties.description: Geometric planar area of the current collector

properties.name: length
properties.description: Length of the current collector. For circular current collectors, the diameter

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of the current collector. For circular current collectors, the diameter

properties.name: shape
properties.description: Shape of the current collector. Valid entries are: rectangular, circular, other, or unkonwn
